name: 李春穎
objective:
太空動力學是質點動力學與剛體動力學於太空領域的應用，課程涵蓋軌道力學 (質點動力學的應用) 與衛星姿態動力學 (剛體動力學的應用)，課程目的是要建立學生關於太空工程的基本軌道知識，提供後續學習太空專業課程所需的力學基礎。
Space mechanics is the application of both particle and rigid-body dynamics in space field. The course contents cover orbital mechanics (application of particle dynamics) and satellite altitude dynamics (application of rigid-body dynamics). The main focus is for the students to build a fundamental mechanics knowledge about orbital engineering for the further development in related fields.
schedule:
週次	課程大綱
1	Overview and Introduction
2-3	Dynamics of point masses
4-5	The two-body problems
6-8	Orbital position as function of time
9	期中考
10-11	Orbits in three-dimensions
12-13	Orbital maneuvers
14-15	Relative motion and rendezvous
16	Interplanetary trajectories
17	Rigid-body dynamics
18	期末考
scorePolicy:
1. 出席及課程參與 10%
2. 作業與報告 60%
3. 期末考 30%
